title: internal surveillance
extract: Mass surveillance is the intricate surveillance of an entire or a substantial fraction of a population in order to monitor that group of citizens. ... Depending on each nation's laws and judicial systems, the legality of and the permission required to engage in mass surveillance varies.
extract_html: Mass surveillance is the intricate surveillance of an entire or a substantial fraction of a population in order to monitor that group of citizens. ... Depending on each nation's laws and judicial systems, the legality of and the permission required to engage in mass surveillance varies.
